name: Coded Together — An always changing story
name_original: Coded Together — An always changing story
description:
Coded Together is a multipath visual novel where everything that you do will always have a consequence. Available Chapters: ChaptersStatusChapter One - The Meeting.Available and ready to be played.Chapter Two - ???
In development.Chapter Three - ???In development.

Dive right into this story divided in three separate chapters full of downloaded assets (Credits at the end.) where every option, every feeling, every smile or tear you cause will have its consequences, rather later than sooner.

You can date a variety of people who start as your friends, but may end up as your bestie, passionate lover or intimate enemy. 

This game is still under development and until now, chapter one is the only one available, yet, it still has some replayability, I would thank your feedback a lot.

This game has lots of endings, will you get them all? 

Credits:

Thanks for the character art, Banya / Laplace Studio. Banya's Website

Thanks for the backgrounds, Potat0Master

Thanks for the Clean GUI, FShift

Thanks for the phone code, nighten

If some credits are wrong, or are missing, please reach out to me, I will immediately put your name in the credits.
